s.text: The longest river in the world brings abundant water from the heart of Africa to irrigate a narrow verdant valley snaking its way through the hundreds of thousands of square kilometers of parched desert that constitute the modern state.
It is, however, the most liberal Muslim state in the Middle East with a constitution and judiciary based on western democratic models, not shariah Muslim law.
Though most of its people claim descent from the ancient Egyptians, modern religious practices and social protocols are totally divorced from those of their ancestors.
